name: The Trial
description: Commander of UAC has been recruiting for a number years now. He has chosen you to go up against a number of other elite UAC space marines for chance to go on to the top secret QUAKE mission. In order to proceed to the Quake mission, you must Beat your opponets to death. Since this is a UAC deathmatch simulator, you are to frag your opponets until they give up. Good luck !!!!!!!!!
